name: Make your holiday to Japan even more enjoyable with Hands-Free travel

products.name: Luggage Delivery from the Airport
products.description: Send your luggage to the hotel from the airport

detailedInfo.longDescription: Free your hands, save time and travel in comfort by sending your luggage from the airport to your hotel and vice versa with Yamato.

products.name: Luggage Delivery Between Hotels
products.description: Travel to your next destination hassle-free

detailedInfo.longDescription: Enjoy traveling to your next destination, even when using crowded public transport, by sending your luggage to your next hotel with Yamato.

products.name: Luggage Storage and Tourist Information Services
products.description: Enjoy your holiday even more with your hands free

detailedInfo.longDescription: Yamato has service counters at train stations and commercial areas where you can temporarily store your luggage and receive tourist information.

products.name: Leisure Goods Delivery
products.description: Travel to ski resorts and golf courses hands free

detailedInfo.longDescription:
Leisure Goods Delivery

Travel to ski resorts and golf courses hands free
Send your heavy ski equipments and golf bags to designated ski resorts and golf courses with Yamato while traveling with your hands free.
